runError.message: No Valid SKU type to calculate the CUs

body.Subject: Workflow failed!!! (Error with the status of Current SKU)
body.Body:
Hello Team,


The Logic app, Workflow has failed due to errors in reading the Current Fabric SKU details. The total CUs value for this query is,


The status of the Fabric SKU should be 'Active' but it is currently as, @{body('Read_Current_SKU')?['properties']?['state']}

Please check the URL below for more info,

https://portal.azure.com/

runError.message: There was an error with the status of the Current Fabric SKU!

body.messageBody:
The Fabric SKU was @{body('Read_Current_SKU')?['sku']?['name']} and is currently set to @{body('Read_the_Final_SKU')?['sku']?['name']} based on the Data calculations for Total CUs used for the last 6 minutes.

The Total CUs percentile value for this session is, @{outputs('Total_CUs_percentile')}

Please, refer to the Logic app Run history below for more details.


https://portal.azure.com

body.Subject: Logic app, Workflow failed!!! (Error in reading the Final SKU)

There was an error when reading the Final Fabric SKU details action step!

body.Subject: Logic app, Workflow failed!!! (Error in reading the Current SKU)
body.Body:
Hello Team,


The Logic app, Workflow has failed due to errors in reading the Current Fabric SKU details. The total CUs value for this query is, @{variables('Current Total CUs')}


Please check the URL below for more info,

https://portal.azure.com

body.query:
EVALUATE
ROW(
    "Sum of CU (s)",
    SUMX(
        TOPN(
            12,
            'CU Detail',
            'CU Detail'[Window end time],
            DESC
        ),
        'CU Detail'[CU (s)]
    )
)

runError.message: There was an error when querying the Power BI dataset action step!

body.Subject: Logic app, Workflowfailed!!! (Error in querying the Fabric capacity metrics dataset)
body.Body:
Hello Team,

The Logic app, Workflow has failed due to errors in querying the Fabric capacity metrics dataset. The Power BI query errors are, @{body('Query_Total_CUs')}


Please check the URL below for more info,
